findings.rationale: The five-year duration may not adequately protect sensitive information that could remain relevant or valuable beyond this period.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing injunctive relief without posting bond may lead to potential misuse by the Disclosing Party, as it reduces the financial barrier to seeking such remedies.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restrictions on assignment may limit flexibility for both parties in the event of a merger or acquisition, potentially impacting business continuity.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
